SEARCH
Package fr.esiee.babaisyou.model

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
fr.esiee.babaisyou.model.Rule
public class Rule extends Object
Represents the rules and logic of the game. This class contains methods to validate and check various game rules and states.

      public Rule()

  • Method Details

    • isValidRule

      public boolean isValidRule(GameBoard board, String name, String operator, String propertyOrName)
      Validates a rule based on the given name, operator, and property or name.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board to check against.
      name - the name to validate.
      operator - the operator to validate.
      propertyOrName - the property or name to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the rule is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are invalid.

    • isValidRuleCombination

      public boolean isValidRuleCombination(Square leftOperand, Square operator, Square rightOperand)
      Validates if a given rule combination is valid.
      Parameters:
      leftOperand - the left operand of the rule.
      operator - the operator of the rule.
      rightOperand - the right operand of the rule.
      Returns:
      true if the rule combination is valid, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.

    • isMatchingRule

      public boolean isMatchingRule(GameBoard board, int row, int col, String name, String operator, String property, Direction direction)
      Checks if a matching rule exists at the specified position and direction.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board to check against.
      row - the row to check.
      col - the column to check.
      name - the name to match.
      operator - the operator to match.
      property - the property to match.
      direction - the direction to check.
      Returns:
      true if a matching rule exists, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if row or col are out of bounds.

    • isValidRuleInDirectionHorizontalOrVertical

      public boolean isValidRuleInDirectionHorizontalOrVertical(GameBoard board, String name, String operator, String property)
      Validates if a rule is valid in either horizontal or vertical direction.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board to check against.
      name - the name to validate.
      operator - the operator to validate.
      property - the property to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the rule is valid in either direction, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.

    • isTraversable

      public boolean isTraversable(GameBoard board, String name)
      Checks if a given name is traversable on the game board.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board to check against.
      name - the name to check.
      Returns:
      true if the name is traversable, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters are null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is invalid.

    • namesToTransform

      public String[] namesToTransform(GameBoard board)
      Finds names that need to be transformed based on game rules.
      Parameters:
      board - the game board to check against.
      Returns:
      an array containing the names to be transformed, or null if none.

      Returns:
